15113.title: Ema

choices: Gumshoe swaps himself with one of Edgeworth's partners
Gumshoe swaps himself with someone so he could impress Maggey
1532.content:
Gumshoe showed up at Mr. Edgeworth's office. He was disappointed to find that Mr. Edgeworth was not there. Gumshoe was getting depressed lately. For one thing he didn't feel like he was a good enough boyfriend for Maggey, she was great and deserved a man who could actually afford a relationship. Another thing that led to his depressed state was that Mr. Edgeworth has had less and less work to give him nowadays, sure there was some things he had to do, but that wasn't nearly enough. Gumshoe didn't have the techniques that Edgeworth's other assistants did. Kay had the replication thingy, Ema had that stuff to see blood, and Judge Courtney was just as smart as him. All Gumshoe had was a metal detector and his trusty fishing pole. Gumshoe pouted and went to sit on Edgeworth's couch. He looked around at all the things Edgeworth had, man he must be rich. All Gumshoe could afford was ramen, and yet his closest friend/co-worker/idol was loaded and living comfortably. Gumshoe decided to look around the office and at Edgeworth's stuff, Surely Mr. Edgeworth wouldn't mind as long as nothing was broken! Gumshoe saw an unopened package laying by the door, he must have not seen it when he came in.

"Hmm....." Gumshoe let out as he thought about opening it. "Packages arrive in the mornin' and It's almost noon now, So if Mr. Edgeworth didn't open it already, that must mean he doesn't want it!" He exclaimed as he took the package and ripped it open. "Ooooh! A T.V remote! Man, Mr. Edgeworth has everything!" He said, not even bothering to look at the instruction booklet. Gumshoe looked around for a T.V. Thankfully he found a tiny emergency one in a cabinet. Gumshoe turned it on and it was on a news station. "Time to see how this baby works!" Gumshoe said and pressed a button without looking at what it was. Nothing Happened. He tried again, nothing. and again, and again, and again. After about twenty tries he gave up "What's the matter with this thing?" He said scratching his head. He looked at the buttons, one said aware and the other said unaware. "What, are these some kind of channel names?" He asked himself.

After about twenty more minutes of trying to figure out how to change the channel with the remote Gumshoe decided to read the instructions. To his amazement it was a body swap remote. Gumshoe fantasized at the possibilities, he could become closer to Edgeworth by swapping with one of his other partners! He could swap himself with Edgeworth and enjoy the life of a rich man! He could even become a better man for Maggey! Gumshoe was practically hopping with excitement!
1532.title: Detective Gumshoe with a body switcher!

15321.content:
The answer of what to do was obvious. Gumshoe loved the feeling of Mr. Edgeworth needing him. It made him feel special. But, nowadays he felt less needed with people like Kay and Ema around. Since they seemed to be needed more than him, Gumshoe knew he needed to become one of them. Of course he needed to find out where Edgeworth was. Gumshoe took out his cell phone, Edgeworth gave it to him to keep in contact.

"Miles Edgeworth Speaking." Edgeworth said in his usual tone.

"Mr. Edgeworth! I was just wondering, where are you right now?" Gumshoe asked nonchalant

"I'm at gourd lake investigating something, it's not a murder case, however I there is someone I'll need to prosecute against."

"Okay, I'm on my way!" Gumshoe shouted and hung up.

Gumshoe ran all the way to gourd lake, remote in pocket, to see Mr. Edgeworth. Just as Gumshoe had hoped Edgeworth was not alone in this investigation. Gumshoe stayed at a distance and pointed the remote at Edgeworth's partner. Who was Edgeworth with?
15321.title: Gumshoe wants to become Edgeworth's partner!

153212.content:
It was the young Ema Skye, the younger sister of Chief Prosecutor Lana Skye. Ema was a very precocious young girl and was a budding forensic investigator. It seemed she had just finished helping Miles take some finger print samples from the crime scene. She had all sorts of tricks in that bag over her shoulder.

Edgeworth hadn't noticed Gumshoe yet, still listening intently to Ema's findings. Gumshoe wished Edgeworth would listen to him so intently...

Well. that's why he had the remote. Excited to finally be useful, Gumshoe eagerly raided the remote and clicked a button, but unfortunately he wasn't paying very close attention. Which swap did he do?
153212.title: Ema Skye

choices: Try to talk with Ema first
1532121.content:
Suddenly, Gumshoe's whole perspective changed, and he was making eye contact with Mr. Edgeworth. Something was different though - Edgeworth was taller than him now!

"Genius, Ema! Now we have a new lead to follow," Miles, exclaimed, giving an approving nod Gumshoe's way.

"Uh, well of course!" Gumshoe replied, his hairs standing on end from all the new sensations. He was so skinny, short, and was suddenly wearing a skirt? Not to mention he had the voice of a child. Ema wasn't much older than 16 after all.

"Now that we have fingerprints from the scene, we should run them through the police database. Then we'll be a step closer in our investigation."

This was amazing! Edgeworth just called Gumshoe a genius. He was so thrilled he barely even considered the differences with his new body for a second. He was smiling so widely that Edgeworth almost looked a bit creeped out, but decided to ignore it.

Gumshoe had a thought occur to him though; wasn't Ema in his body? She must be very confused. Should he try to clear things up with her first, or just leave with Miles before she potentially comes to ruin the moment?
1532121.title: Aware

15321212.content:
Gumshoe felt it was only fair to talk with Ema. Not to mention, it'd be risky to just leave the device unattended. He probably didn't want to be trapped, after all!

"Uh, just one second, Mr. Edgeworth," he said, "I have to umm... use the bathroom!"

"Well, I suppose I need to wait for Gumshoe anyways. He's late; he ought to know better," Edgeworth said offhandedly. Gumshoe cringed a bit - that might've been a hit to his paycheck. But then, he supposed it wasn't his salary at the moment.

Quickly breaking away from the investigation, Gumshoe made his way back to his little 'vantage point' between some trees a bit off the trail. He was lucky the investigation was at Gourd Lake - otherwise there may have been fewer places to hide. What he found was rather surprising - his own body was unconscious! Poor Ema must have fainted from the shock. Gumshoe noticed the device was just a foot away, and decided to quickly pick it up and put it in the pocket of his new lab coat.

"Uh oh," Gumshoe mumbled. How was he going to get her... or him, up? "Wait! I ought to have something, I'm Ema Skye after all," he realized with some satisfaction. Reaching into Ema's purse, Gumshoe found a number of tools and items until he found what he was looking for: smelling salts! He put them up to Ema's nose, and her eyes slowly opened.

"Oh lord, what an awful dream..." she mumbled before her eyes bugged out. A hand shot to her throat. "Was that- Ah! It's not a dream!"

"Woah woah! Calm down pal!" Gumshoe exclaimed.

"Ah!" she shouted again, realizing her own body was talking to her. "This- this isn't scientific at all! Who are you!"

"Ema, its me - Gumshoe!"

After a few minutes of explaining, Ema finally calmed down a bit. The... unscientific nature of it all still bothered her, but she found a way to suspend her disbelief.

"One thing is still bothering me though, Detective," she said. "Why would you swap with me?!"

"Uh, well," Gumshoe stalled a moment. Upon reflection, his motives were a bit desperate, but he didn't want to back away now. "You're always talking about how you want to be a detective, right!"

"I want to be a forensic investigator, Detective!" She responded.

"Well, being a detective is close!" Gumshoe said, hands on his hips. "It's all investigation after all, and its still law enforcement. I figured you would like the chance to work law enforcement first hand."

Ema's eyes seemed to light up from Gumshoe's body. "Really? You'd let me do that!"

"Of course! Not a lot of kids are as dedicated to justice as you. You deserve it!"

"Wow! Thanks Detective Gumshoe!" She bought the excuse hook, line, and sinker it seemed.

"Good, now follow me. We're going to meet back up with Mr. Edgeworth, He's going to need those fingerprints analyzed, so you'll probably get the chance to see the database over at the precinct."
15321212.title: Try to talk with Ema first

choices: Skip to the end of the investigation
153212121.content:
Eventually, the two bodyswapped investigators made their way back to Edgeworth. "Ah, Gumshoe, good to see you finally arrived," Edgeworth said, sounding slightly annoyed. "We're investigating a burglary. An important museum piece was taken late last night, and a vehicle that was seen leaving the premises was found abandoned at the lake."

Ema nodded, having already gotten the details prior; Gumshoe-as-Ema was pretty grateful for the refresher, on the other hand.

"The license plate was removed and at first it seemed like no evidence was left in the vehicle, but with Ema's help, the other investigators and I managed to acquire some fingerprints," he continued. "I'm going to need you to take these to the precinct and find a match. Do you understand?"

"You got it!" Ema as Gumshoe exclaimed with a smile and a thumbs up.

Edgeworth raised and eyebrow but brushed it aside. "Excellent. I am going to return to the museum. Once you find a match, come back as quickly as possible." He handed the envelope with the evidence over to "Gumshoe", who quickly left the scene to head to the precinct.

As they parted ways with Ema, Edgeworth addressed his young assistant. "I won't ask you to accompany me further , as a criminal case might be dangerous, but you have been very helpful Ema. If you wish to continue investigating with me, I will give no objections."

Gumshoe smiled brightly at this. "Of course I'll go with you!" The two of them then got into Edgeworth's car and drove to the crime scene to continue their investigation.
153212121.title: Follow Gumshoe as Ema

1532121212.content:
Several hours later an the museum thief was finally in police custody. "Don't worry officers, I will see to it that the burglar gets his due sentence in court," Edgeworth said as the police took the man, Mask☆DeMasque III, into a car to take him to the precinct.

By this point, Edgeworth, Ema, and Gumshoe were all gathered together. The case was almost over before Ema came back with before unseen blood samples that managed to finally incriminate the thief and successfully put him behind bars. Gumshoe was kind of miffed he didn't think of it himself; to think that he was shown up by someone using his own body...

"You two did excellently," Edgeworth suddenly said, turning to his two assistants. Both Gumshoe and Ema, still in each other's bodies, beamed at the compliment. "You did especially well, Gumshoe. I admit I did not expect you to pull through as well as you did," he continued, patting Ema-as-Gumshoe on the shoulder.

'Well, I suppose Ema atleast won me some points with Edgeworth,' Gumshoe noted.'That'll be good when I get back to normal.'

As the group disbanded, Gumshoe approached Ema. "So kid, how was it?"

"It was awesome!" Ema proclaimed. "Being an old guy - no offense - was weird, but having access to all of that stuff at the police department and having authority was great! I even got to save the case!"

"Well, I'm glad you enjoyed it," Gumshoe responded, a bit crestfallen at the 'old' comment. "You ready to turn back now?"

Ema seemed a bit hesitant to respond. she began to rub the back of her head for a moment before speaking. "Actually, I wanted to ask a favor. Could we stay like this, just for another day a or two?"

Gumshoe was shocked. "What - why?!"

"Because working at the station was really interesting, and you're the only person who'd be cool enough to let me do something like this. I doubt anyone else would let me use their body to work at the station like you did. So please, what do you say?"

Gumshoe pondered it for a second. Maybe it wouldn't be a bad idea to stay this way for another day? After all, Edgeworth took well to it. What does he do?
1532121212.title: Skip to the end of the investigation

15321212122.content:
"...well, okay. Just be careful, alright pal?" Gumshoe replied.

Ema pumped an arm, "Alright! You won't regret it Detective!"

Wit that, the two of them parted ways. As Ema explained, she was staying with relatives in the states over the summer, so he went to the address she gave him on a slip of paper. Thankfully, her family members seemed quiet, and gave Gumshoe little trouble as he made his way to his new room. He doubted his ability to really imitate Ema in front of people who knew her well.

Now alone in her room, Gumshoe pondered his next move. He fished through Ema's purse and reproduced the remote he had stashed there earlier. "Atleast I still have you. Now what to do..."

It suddenly occurred to Gumshoe that he was in a much younger body, and suddenly female. He searched the room, eventually finding a mirror. "Got so wrapped up in the investigation I almost forgot about the body..." He realized that Ema was a slight bit older than he gave her credit for; she was probably around 19 or so now that he looked closely. Still, she was much younger than he was. She also DRESSED much differently, wearing a skirt and labcoat, most notably.

He stared at his reflection with a blank face, trying to avoid the awkward reality that he'd have to change her clothes or bathe EVENTUALLY. He lifted the coat and smelled it; "I am a bit grimy after the lake..."

Gumshoe took the coat off and draped it over a chair for the moment. He was unsure of how to proceed, and his new reflection in the mirror was stressing him out about it. He had to admit, he was curious to look further at his body, but it just felt awfully rude. Ema was younger than he was, and it all just seemed ungentlemanly. She was the one who wanted to stay this way however...

He considered his options. He could just get over it, and go about cleaning his body off, or he could use the remote again. There was an unaware swap function - he could possibly grab a more comfortable body and just use that until the time being that he could swap back to his own. What did he do?
15321212122.title: Ema for the Night

153212121221.content:
"i just got to man up... or something," Gumshoe said aloud as he stared resolutely at his new reflection. "Besides, it'd be irresponsible to just switch bodies with a random person. Well, it'd be irresponsible to do it a SECOND time." 'At least Ema sorta gave permission after the fact.'

It was barely even 9:00, but Gumshoe didn't really know what to do in his current situation. He wanted to put off showering, but he lacked any clue as to what Ema did in her free time. Did she have friends? Did she work out? There were a plethora of books scattered around, all science related, and Gumshoe felt they would just hurt his head.

With nothing else really coming to mind, Gumshoe decided to just go to sleep. He realized, with some relief, that Ema wouldn't have school as it was summer. And since he was in her body, he wouldn't have to go to work either. "I'll just use this as an opportunity to sleep-in," Gumshoe decides as he undid Ema's hair, letting it fall loose to his new shoulders. He wasn't exactly in sleeping attire, but he decided it was okay to just sleep in what Ema was wearing for tonight. He'd worry about changing tomorrow.

---

Light shone in one Gumshoe's face as he slowly pulled himself out of bed. He let out a long yawn before giving a startled jump at his high-pitched voice. He threw the covers off and looked down, suddenly remembering his exchange with Ema.

'This was a crazy thing to do!" He exclaimed. "Could've sworn it was all just a dream... too late to regret it now I guess." He pulled himself out of bed and looked at the clock. 11:37 a.m. "Suppose I got a good night's sleep out of it for what it's worth. Lets hope Ema is doing okay."

He once again went over to Ema's full-body mirror, and looked at his reflection. Now Ema seemed like a mess. Her clothes (a button up shirt and a blue skirt) were all messy and wrinkled, her hair was wild and skewed, and the smell of the lake was beginning to catch up with him. He stared begrudgingly for a second before cracking. "Fine! I'll clean myself off."

Gumshoe searched through Ema's drawers and found a new set of clothes - his face red by the time he was done. Fortunately, he managed to find a n outfit that he felt comfortable with. A simple pair of black pants and a white button up shirt. He also found an extra towel, which he wrapped around his face to act as a sort of blindfold as he undertook the task of showering. Undressing was still immensely strange to him, however, and the ... feeling of the water was strange as well.

"Hopefully I won't need to do this a second time," Gumshoe muttered as he eventually exited the shower, wrapping a second towel around Ema's body. Dressing with the makeshift blindfold was, in itself, a chore too. Ema's clothes were very foreign too him (why would he ever need a bra!?) so it took quite some effort to finally get it all together. By the time he was done and ready to throw off the blindfold, he felt he had learned far too much by touch alone, and that the blindfold probably amplified the whole nonsense.

Thoroughly uncomfortable, he turned to the mirror. "Hmm, something out of place," he wondered what it was for a moment, "ah! The hair. I guess I'll tie it for her." Gumshoe then found the hair tie from last night and bound her hair up, but it still seemed wrong to him. Then it struck him, "The lab coat! That's it!" Searching Ema's closet, he eventually found a line of white coats, donning one.

"My hair is still a bit scruffy, but otherwise I reckon I did a decent job of it," Gumshoe noted, as he looked himself over. Seeing the complete picture, he was vaguely proud of his work, almost forgetting the embarrassment.

Now he had to figure out what to do with the rest of the day, however. He could go to the station and track down Ema, to make sure she was doing okay, or he could just take the day off and go elsewhere. What did young people do these days? It might be a nice experience to just cut back and enjoy an afternoon as someone else, even if it was a young girl.
153212121221.title: Stayed as Ema

1532121212212.content:
"Ema did fine yesterday, she's smart, she won't need my help," Gumshoe decided, waving his hand. "Besides, everyone underestimates me anyways, so its not like her expectations are all that high..." That pessimistic thought alone was enough to convince Gumshoe that he needed an afternoon away from the station. Just a day to get outside and relax!

He picked the device off Ema's desk. He didn't intend to lose it, but felt it best to keep hold of it. He put it in Ema's purse and slung it over her shoulder, giving her relatives a brief greeting as he left the home.

Her father, Phoenix Wright, was currently at home, preparing for his trip to Kurain, while the office's other two employees, Apollo and Athena, were out investigating a case. She had the office all to herself, which she was taking advantage of to practice her magic tricks. She used to just practice whenever she wanted, but with there now being three lawyers in the office compared to just one of her, she felt a bit outnumbered.

Before she could move on to her next trick, she heard a knock at the door. "Hm, I wonder who that is," she wondered aloud, heading over to the front door to find out, weaving her way through all the things she used for her magic tricks strewn around the office. She opened the door, half expected it to be a client, but to her surprise, all that was there was a small package. It seemed to be unlabeled, which made it difficult to tell who it was actually for.

"I'm sure they wouldn't mind if I just took a peek inside," Trucy said to herself, and she picked up the package and took it back inside the office. She snatched a pair of scissors off her dad's desk, sit down of the office couch, and set about opening up the package. Inside, there was a small device, like a TV remote, and an instruction manual. Trucy was now even less sure who in the office this belonged too. She supposed the best way to find out right now was to read through the manual and figure out what the remote actually controlled.

To her surprise, the remote wasn't for any sort of electronic device, but rather it was supposedly able to swap people's bodies around. Trucy mind raced as she imagined all the things she could do with this thing. She'd almost certainly have to incorporate it into one of her magic shows somehow. It's not like anyone else here at the office would have ordered this thing, right? The only question was what to do with it. What would be the best way to work it into a magic trick? She figured she should probably test out how it worked first.

As luck would have it, someone came to the office just as she was thinking that. But who was it?
1553323.title: Dual Destinies

choices: Phoenix, getting something for his trip
Apollo and Athena, going over their case
15533231.content: Trucy was caught off guard as someone suddenly burst through the door of the office, prompting her to hide the remote behind her back. This would be the perfect opportunity for her to try out the remote, but she didn't want her potential test subject to know about the remote just yet. But who was it that entered the office?
15533231.title: One of the lawyers of the Wright Anything Agency

choices: Swap herself with Apollo or Athena
Swap Apollo and Athena with each other
155332312.content:
"I can't believe they didn't let us into the crime scene." Trucy would have recognised that voice anywhere; it was one of the office's employees, Athena Cykes. It seemed she and Apollo had returned to the office after speaking to their client.

"The crime's still really recent and the police aren't done with the crime scene left. It's only natural we wouldn't be allowed in."

"But we need to investigate! How are we supposed to prove our client innocent if we can't check out the crime scene?"

"We'll just need to come up with another plan of attack until the police are done."

The two of them seemed to be so wrapped up in their conversation that they didn't even notice that Trucy was watching and listening. This, of course, made it the perfect opportunity to test out the remote. Trucy took the remote out from behind her back, and aimed it at the duo of lawyers. Now it was a matter of figuring out what to do. She could easily swap herself with one of them, she had to admit she was kind of curious to see what it would be like to be in someone else's body. However, it could be just as interesting, not to mention funny, if she swapped them with each other, leaving Apollo in Athena's body and Athena in Apollo's. In the end, she decided to...
155332312.title: Apollo and Athena, going over their case

1553323122.content:
Trucy figured the two were as good a target as any. She slyly lifted the remote and clicked the "Aware" button on Apollo, and then on Athena. Apollo, who was holding a folder full of papers, abruptly dropped everything he was carrying and pointed at a shocked Athena,. "What am I doing over there?!" he cried in a loud voice, prompting Athena put her hands over her ears.

"Oooow," Apollo-as-Athena moaned, before noticing his voice. He looked down at himself, realizing his outfit had changed. He was dressed in a skirt... and was a girl! His hands were quickly moving across his body in surprise, realizing how different it all was. "Wait, what the hell?!"

Athena-as-Apollo tried to hold Apollo's hands still, but it only freaked him out more. Trucy couldn't help but chuckle at how chaotic it was. 'As far as they know, it happened for no reason. This would be an incredible magic trick! I'd be like a legend!' With that thought in her head, she was almost ready to go show it off to more people, but then she recalled Apollo and Athena yelling in the room with her. They seemed to wrapped up in trying to figure out what happened that they hardly even noticed Trucy was in the room. 'Should I tell them? Might be fun to let them stay like that for a day, see what they do.'

Does Trucy let the two in on her new toy, or just leave them in the dark about why they swapped?
1553323122.title: Swap Apollo and Athena with each other

choices: Follow a switched Athena and Apollo
15533231222.content:
Trucy thought that watching Apollo and Athena freak out was too much fun. She slipped the device away into her cloak, and decided to keep it a secret while Apollo and Athena were still yelling at one another.

"What are we going to do?" Athena shouted, grabbing Apollo by the shoulders, "I can't be you!"

Apollo raised his arms up, "just calm down and breathe! We'll be okay, right? Just tell yourself you'll be fine, like I do."

Athena took a deep breath and muttered, "I'm Athena Cykes and I'm fine..." It didn't sound right but it seemed to do the trick. She looked down at her arms, now a bit curious. "How could this have happened?"

Apollo shrugged, "I don't know, but Mr. Wright says he's seen ghosts before, so I wouldn't rule it out of the realm of possibilities. Maybe we should just... wait for it to fix itself? Let's get back to the investigation, okay? Maybe it'll distract us." Apollo bent down and proceeded to gather up the papers and files he had dropped previously, getting annoyed by the way his now-longer hair got in the way.

They both seemed to be completely ignoring Tucry's giggles from across the room, too engrossed in their own plight. Suddenly, Trucy piped up, "hey, I'm heading out you two! If daddy asks, tell him I'm seeing some friends from school!"

Apollo turned around and gave a nervous smile with Athena's face. "Oh! Uh, sure thing Trucy, have fun?" Trucy proceeded to bound out of the house with excitement, ready to have even more fun with the device while the two bewildered attorney's pondered there next course of action.
15533231222.title: Trucy lets things play out

choices: Wait till her show before using the remote again
Go somewhere and test it again
155332312221.content:
Trucy laughed as she left the office. This remote was actually worked and it was amazing! This would make a great trick for her magic shows! Not to mention that seeing two people in each other's bodies was hilarious. She was still laughing at Apollo and Athena's initial surprise at being in each others bodies.

She did wonder whether or not Apollo and Athena would be able to focus on their case in each other's bodies. Being in each other's bodies would probably distract them a lot and possibly throw them off during while they were doing their job. But They were great lawyers though, they could probably handle anything that could happen to them and still get their client the right verdict, Trucy thought.

Now there was just one question left. What should she do with the remote now? She could just wait till her magic show to use it again, but her show at the wonder bar wasn't til later tonight. Plus, she only used the remote once, she should probably go and get a feel for swapping people before she uses it in one of her shows. Maybe she should go around town for a little while now and swap some people she knew for a while?

On the other hand, if she switched other people too much people would begin to put together that she was doing it and she wanted to keep the remote a secret, at least until her show tonight. 'The Amazing Body Switch' trick wouldn't have as much pizzazz if there were already plenty of people around town who were switched up.

Trucy thought about it for awhile, both options had their advantages and both had their disadvantages. In the end she decided to....,

1553323122212.content: There were many places to go to swap people, but Trucy decided to go to...

choices: He gets a visitor while in his cell
15533312.content:
It was another dull day in a prison cell for Kristoph after he had been convicted for Shadi Smith's murder; at least, it was almost dull.

A mysterious had been delivered to his cell today. While he had received mail within prison before, he usually knew who it came from. He had a lot of 'friends' after all who pulled strings for him while he was incarcerated. This package however, was unmarked. He was frankly surprised that the prison guards would let him have it at all, but then, one would be surprised that the prison guards let him have a cell as lavish as his own at all.

Reading over the pamphlet that came with the device, he couldn't help but laugh. It was all nonsense. 'Switching bodies? Absurd.' Still, the thought appealed to him. If he could swap bodies, he could escape his predicament! The options were limitless; he could become someone like Mr. Wright or his brother and seek revenge, or steal his former protege's body and resume a law career. Honestly, if he could switch with anyone, then there really wouldn't be such a thing as consequence anymore. It was a pleasant thought.

"I suppose curiosity doesn't hurt anyone," he said, deciding to give the device a try.

Where does he find his target?
15533312.title: Apollo Justice

155333122.content:
As Kirstoph thought about who to swap with a two guards came to his cell. "Kristoph Gavin, you're needed in court today." They told him. Krisoph was expecting this. Vera Misham had been given a Not Guilty verdict a few weeks ago. Now he was to be charged with the murder of Drew Misham. He didn't expect the trial to last very long, he had already confessed to it. This may as well have been a paperwork filling session. He put the remote in his pocket and left with the guards

As he was brought into court and guided to the defendant's lobby he saw that Apollo Justice was his defense attorney. "My, my. Isn't this a surprise. Have a change of heart about me Mr. Justice?" He said with a flip of his hair.

Apollo gritted his teeth. "No, I still think you're one of the most cold hearted people on the planet. Vera wasn't that far off when she called you 'The Devil'" Apollo said in anger

"You wound me, Justice." Kristoph said, looking down on Apollo. "So, just why are you here then. Are you going to purposely lose, just to give me a guilty verdict?"

Apollo shook his head. "No, you're a horrible person, but you're still a person. You deserve a fair trial. Don't expect a Not Guilty verdict, but I'll do what a defense attorney is supposed to do." Apollo said, as soon as he said that both he and Kristoph were called into court.

Kristoph laughed to himself about Apollo's whole 'fair trial' speech. What nonsense. As he entered the courtroom and stood at the defendant's stand, he looked around, it was as if he was called into a Reunion. Not only was Apollo his attorney, but Mr. Wright's daughter was with him assisting. On the prosecution's side he saw his own brother, Klavier. He wasn't surprised to see that traitor going against him. He looked around the courtroom some more. The detective in charge of this case was that detective Skye girl who he had seen working with his brother a few times before. It also seemed that Vera Misham was brought to the courtroom as a witness against him, no surprise there.

He smirked as he thought about all the people in the room. Each person would be good to swap with, each one of their bodies could be used as either a means of revenge or a way to start over his law career. He looked around once more and subtly grabbed the remote from his pocket. He made sure to be careful and hit aware swap before chose who to swap with. If he was seen with the remote, it would certainly be taken from him. He had only one shot. He chose to swap with......
155333122.title: Kristoph is called into court

choices: Runs into Apollo and Trucy on his way out
1553331222.content:
Klavier made his decision of who to swap with, Vera Misham. It was during her trial that not only was he revealed as the one who had ruined Phoenix Wright's career, but it was also the trial in which his own brother had betrayed him. Switching with her would be a delightful bit of irony. The forger girl who just got a Not Guilty verdict would be put in jail in the body of the man who had tried to kill her.

He pressed the button and in an instant he was standing on the other side of the court room. He felt completely different. He was now definitely female, there was a large sketchbook in his hand, and Bits of dark blue hair fell into his face. It was clear that the swapped had worked and he was now in the body of Vera Misham. An evil grin appeared on his, or rather, Vera's face as he looked over to where he was standing before.

His old body seemed absolutely horrified, but it wasn't screaming or saying anything. It seemed to be in too much shock about the situation, that added to the fact that Vera wasn't a very talkative person in the first place made it seem like his old body was acting like any person would if they were being charged with murder. One of the bailiffs had noticed the remote and confiscated it from his body, he would need to retrieve that later.

The trial wasn't very long, it wasn't as if anyone had actually planned to draw it out. It was obvious that Kristoph was guilty. As the judge handed down the verdict, Vera in Kristoph's body had broken down into tears. As the court bailiffs were escorting Vera in his body over to the police Kristoph walked over to them. "Excuse me, but I left a remote by the defendants stand earlier and I need it back." He lied. As the bailiff handed the remote to him, Kristoph looked at Vera, who was in shock at seeing her own body. "No one will ever believe you, so don't talk about it." He told her and walked away.

He pocketed the remote and began to head out of the courthouse. He wondered where to head. He doubted he could go back to his home for now, that would be suspicious. He supposed he could head for Vera's home for the time being, it wasn't as if she would ever be using it again.
1553331222.title: Vera Misham

choices: Kristoph begins to plot his Revenge
He spends some time getting used to his new body first
15533312221.content:
Feeling satisfied with himself, Kristoph made a short trip to Vera's home, a place he was well familiarized with. Looking around, he eventually came across the room of Drew Misham, one of his victims. Figuring no one would enter this room for a while, he found a small lockbox to hide the device in, so that he could be secure in his position. There was something devious about coming into his home now, having stolen his daughter's life. Kristoph couldn't help but feel satisfied at it all. Vera's breakdown couldn't have been more well timed - everyone would just think she was a mad criminal at the end of their rope. Kristoph himself had seen many criminals have similar meltdowns in court - he himself had been privy to one that he wasn't very fond of remembering.

His old life was behind him now, though. Finding Vera's room, he stared over his new reflection. Vera was a very unassuming girl; she'd make a great cover for his revenge, and when he was done with her body he'd move on to a new one. There was no rush now, however. He didn't have the limitations of a prison cell or the looming threat of death row to hold him back anymore.

He gave his new face a smile. "Well Vera, it seems you'll help me get revenge again." Without any particular respect for Vera's privacy, Kristoph disrobed and dressed Vera's body in a long nightgown. It was an odd feeling, being young and female, but he welcomed the change. He kept his composure until his trial, but he hadn't slept in quite a while since his breakdown at the jury. Finally free of the consequences of their foolish decision, he felt alleviated. "Nothing can be done without a good night's sleep," he reasoned. "I'll rest, and begin my new path tomorrow."

---

The next morning, Kristoph slowly woke up. He was a bit confused at first, but everything came back to him once he saw himself in the mirror. "It wasn't a dream then! Excellent." He lifted himself out of bed with a long stretch and yawn.

Thinking things over, he decided he had two options laid out before him. No one would suspect Vera of anything criminal - especially after she just got acquitted for a murder - so he was beyond suspicion for most any crime he committed. However, it'd likely do him good to get into character before carrying out any plots. Maybe he could spend some time acclimating to his new body/life before he used it for crime? Either way, if things went South he could make an easy escape with the device.

15533321.content:
Winston was walking to his office, he was feeling down on his luck. Despite being the amazing rookie killer, he had not only lost to two rookies, but everyone in the prosecutors office thought he was the janitor! Why was this? He was easily the most experienced and most charismatic Genteel-man the he knew!

He was convinced that those rookies that had beat him cheated in court! They were using forged evidence or something like that. He just needed a way to prove it. He needed a way to get into Wright and Co. law offices to spy on him, but how would he do that?

once he got to the office he opened the door and found a package laying down on his floor. "Must be a gift from admiring fans" He presumed as he picked up the package and began to open it. Inside was a strange remote with some instructions. He read through the instructions and got a basic understanding of what the remote did. This was perfect! He could easily spy on Wright and Co. with this, but who to swap with?

Wright was completely out of the question. He wanted to spy on him, if he swapped with him, then he wouldn't do anything worth spying on. He needed to swap with someone who was close to Wright, like that strange clothed girl who was always with him! If he swapped with her then he would have absolutely no problem spying on Wright!

However, did he really want to switch with her? Maybe he should think this through a bit
15533321.title: Winston Payne with a body swapper

155333312.content:
Pearl Fey stepped out the front of her door, carrying her backpack with her. It was the weekend, so she didn't have to go to school, but she was leaving early anyway to catch the train into the city. She was planning to visit her friends over at the Wright Anything Agency. Mystic Maya was unfortunately unable to come today, but she had a letter from her in her backpack to give to Mr. Nick.

Before she could leave, though, she noticed there was a package on her doorstep addressed to her. Curious as she was about it, and wondering who might have sent it, Pearl knew she didn't have time to check it out. She was running a little late as it was, and she didn't want to miss the train. So instead, she grabbed the package and put it in her backpack, before running down to the train station.

Once she was safely on the train and on her way to the city, making it on just before it left, Pearl pulled the package out of her backpack and started to open it up. Inside was some sort of remote that Pearl was unable to recognise. She was much more familiar with modern technology now than she had been when she was a kid, but she still didn't know what this was. The closest thing she could think of was a TV remote or something, but this one only had two buttons, one labeled "aware" and the other labeled "unaware". There was also some kind of instruction manual in the box, so Pearl decided to read through it and try to figure out what it was.

Even after reading it, though, Pearl still found it a little hard to believe. The remote could apparently swap two people's bodies. It seemed almost like spirit channeling, except instead of channeling the spirit of a dead person, it swapped the spirits of two alive people, and instead of relying on a spirit medium, it used this little remote thing. Could a machine really do something like that? Pearl really wanted to try it out, but it seemed kind of irresponsible to go testing it out on random people. She thought about where the best place to use it would be. Ideally, she would have liked to show Mystic Maya, but she was already on the train heading away from Kurain Village, and Maya was busy today anyway. Perhaps Mr. Nick and her friends at the Wright Anything Agency would be interested in trying out. She was planning on visiting them today anyway, and she still had to deliver Mystic Maya's letter. Then again, they were usually busy with all their legal work, and Pearl didn't really want to interrupt with something like this. But where else could she go? It took her a while to think of it, but eventually she thought about visiting Shipshape Aquarium. She had been there on a school field trip before and made some friends after accidentally getting lost and helping with Mr. Nick's investigation for a case. However, she may have found her way behind the scenes of the aquarium before, but with them open for business, she might not be able to do so again and see the employees she'd made friends with.

As the train pulled up at the station, Pearl got off, putting the remote and manual in her backpack, and the box it came in in the trash can, and headed off towards...

info.brief_description: A Phoenix Wright Ace Attorney character gets the ability to swap their's and others bodies
info.description:
READ THESE RULES BEFORE ADDING CHAPTERS. DON'T WORRY THERE ISN'T MANY
There are two types of swaps that can be preformed aware and unaware this is how each of those swaps work

If Phoenix did an aware swap with Maya then Maya would know they swapped. Everyone would see Phoenix in Maya's body as Maya

If Phoenix did and unaware swap with Maya then Maya wouldn't know they swapped. Everyone would see Phoenix in Maya's body as Phoenix

If Phoenix were to aware swap two other people then both of those people would be able to notice the swap and everyone would see them as each other

If Phoenix were to do an unaware swap on two other people then they wouldn't know they are swapped however Phoenix would know

You may use characters from any ace attorney game.

There is only one remote. Whoever finds it may give it to others, but there is only one

Only Ace Attorney characters

Keep this T rated

No ending the Story! There is always a way it can continue!

Have characters only appear time periods they should be in EX: No Kristoph in dual destinies, No Professor Means in the original trilogy

No killing off Ace Attorney characters. If you want to have a murder case then make up a character to die for the case.

No mental changes for aware swaps! characters may like another persons' life more, but not think they are the other person

Please ADD!

If you have any questions about the interactive or these rules, message me

There's a second more organized one, check it out http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/2078471-Ace-Attorney-Body-Swap-2
